__data__.text:
"We were just passing through Montreal on a road trip and were recommended this gem by a waiter in Toronto and so happy we got to eat here! I set a waitlist alert and was lucky enough to get a table.

we let our server pick our food and wine and she did not disappoint! Wines were fun, funky, paired well and delicious!

I would say our starters were hands down the highlight. So creative, so delicious and just an explosion of fun flavors.

Our server was bubbly and friendly and everything you want in an attentive but busy server. We spoke to one other as we wrapped up our meal and she was extremely friendly as well. Host was too.

Overall A++ experience. The vibe is also executed flawlessly. It’s like just the right amount of intentionally casually and slightly elevated. All the ambiance.

Can see why they’re doing so well!

I think meal was about $250 for 3 starters, 2 mains and a few half glasses of wine paired"
Wonderful food, seasonal ingredients highlighted to perfection.
I can only say that the accolades are extremely well deserved. Our meal confirmed for me that this is the best restaurant in Montreal and I have no reason to doubt those that have declared it best in Canada.
"(Translated by Google) A Tuesday, 5:30 pm with the sparkling Rose!
Great find in Little Italy.
A Wow Team!
Nice report in La Presse.
To discover absolutely!
Bravo Group

(Original)
Un Mardi , 5:30pm avec la pétillante Rose !
Belle découverte dans la Petite Italie .
Une Équipe Wow !
Beau reportage dans La Presse .
A découvrir absolument!
Bravo Groupe"
"Had an incredible experience here- I walked in solo on a Saturday evening and asked if they could accommodate me being a vegetarian, which they very happily did. The staff were kind, friendly and knowledgeable. Atmosphere is also friendly and relaxed- you can see the kitchen staff preparing food and they look like such a cohesive, friendly, well-oiled team.

I didn’t quite understand the menu initially so I followed the server’s recommendations both for wine and food, and everything was unique and delightfully delicious. Portion sizes were perfect- I didn’t have any leftovers but didn’t feel overly full either. With every course, they would wipe the tables down and I got new wine (got half glasses so I could try more!) and new cutlery so it’s like you’re starting fresh each time.

It’s def on the pricier side especially with the wine and all the menu items to try. But definitely worth it to save up to visit."
"(Translated by Google) It's always a great pleasure to go to Mon Lapin. Winner of the number 1 position for Best Restaurant in Canada didn't surprise me at all.

(Original)
C'est toujours un immense bonheur d'aller chez Mon Lapin. Gagnant de la position numéro 1 du meilleur restaurant au Canada ne m'a pas du tout surprise."
What a great restaurant! The staff is amazing!!!! The wine program is perfect and the food is unbelievable. The result of hard work and knowledge.
"(Translated by Google) Do not count on the “walk in” as the site says. We were there at 4:45 and apparently there were only 4 places for the walk ins and we were dismissed like beggars by a most condescending hostess. I won't try it again, that's for sure. Even if it is the best restaurant in the world, people are treated with more respect.

(Original)

the food is unbelievable. The result of hard work and knowledge.
"(Translated by Google) Do not count on the “walk in” as the site says. We were there at 4:45 and apparently there were only 4 places for the walk ins and we were dismissed like beggars by a most condescending hostess. I won't try it again, that's for sure. Even if it is the best restaurant in the world, people are treated with more respect.

(Original)
Ne comptez surtout pas sur les “walk in” comme le dit le site. Nous y étions à 4h45 et apparemment il n’y avait que 4 places pour les walk in et nous avons été congédiés comme des mendiants par une hôtesse des plus condescendantes. Je ne m’y essayerai plus, c’est certain. Même si c’est le meilleure restaurant au monde, on traite les gens avec plus de respect."
"(Translated by Google) Good restaurant, nothing more. The service is good, the dishes are presented to us as being quite exceptional, but that's fine. We are encouraged to spend more on wine by being presented with more expensive wines. Disappointing, big bill for a good quality restaurant but not exceptional at all. We won't be going back.

(Original)
Bon restaurant, sans plus. Le service est bon, on nous présente les plats comme étant tout à fait exceptionnels, mais c’est bien sans plus. On nous encourage à dépenser plus pour les vins on nous en présentant des vins plus dispendieux. Décevant, grosse facture pour un restaurant de bonne qualité mais pas du tout exceptionnel. Nous n’y retournerons pas."
Rude host! Complete turn off when entering the restaurant. You’re there to serve and host, not think you are better than anyone who walks in. Please teach the gentlemen to handle walk ins better.
"(Translated by Google) Outstanding ! I consider this restaurant in a higher category. The dishes are exquisite, the presentations meticulous and the service impeccable. Take the time to make a reservation. This restaurant is absolutely fantastic!

(Original)
Remarquable ! Je considère ce restaurant dans une catégorie supérieure. Les plats sont exquis, les présentations soignées et le service impeccable. Prenez le temps de faire une réservation. Ce restaurant est absolument fantastique !"
🤠
"(Translated by Google) The best restaurant in Canada and with good reason.

(Original)
Le meilleur resto au Canada et avec raison."
Very good
Amazing service and food, 10/10
Montréal, a city with many incredible dining options, is so very lucky to have Mon Lapin. The food, service and atmosphere are truly unbeatable. I never want my evening to end here and I really have to force myself not to choose this restaurant for all occasions. Such a special experience, each and every time. Thank you to the entire team!
"(Translated by Google) Dinner with a friend: snow crab with toast: sublime! Homemade chips with canned leeks, a delight! Beef cheek, melts in your mouth (we cut it with a spoon).

(Original)
Souper avec une copine: le crab des neiges avec toasts: sublime! Les chips maison avec poireaux en boite, un delice! Joue de boeuf,  fond dans la bouche (on l'a coupé avec une cuillère)."
"(Translated by Google) What happiness in the plates and in the smiles of the waiters. Full of flavors, a real bias, a real originality, all of this put at the service of the product. A real little candy

(Original)
Quel bonheur dans les assiettes et dans le sourire des

with toast: sublime! Homemade chips with canned leeks, a delight! Beef cheek, melts in your mouth (we cut it with a spoon).

(Original)
Quel bonheur dans les assiettes et dans le sourire des serveurs. Pleins de saveurs, un vrai parti pris, une vraie originalité, tout ça mis au service du produit. Un vrai petit bonbon"
Phenomenal meal from the first to the last plate. Excellent service. Perfect lighting.  Good vibes and one of the best culinary experiences. Go.
Came here with my boyfriend for dinner. Our server was incredible, she was extremely knowledgeable about the wine menu and the food menu, wish I remembered her name to give her credit but she had glasses and light brown hair in a bun! The food was amazing, the service was very attentive from everyone present. The atmosphere was trendy and nice, I loved the booth in-front of the mirror seat. Will totally be coming back.
Wonderful experience while visiting Montréal! The service was attentive and helpful, assisting us in coursing out a full family meal. The seafood was a highlight, especially the raw scallops and the scallop sandwich. Prepare for a pricey meal, definitely a special treat for a night out. Would definitely go back some day!
"(Translated by Google) Bad experience, maybe bad choice of food on our part, but impeccable service

(Original)
Mauvaise expérience, peut-être un mauvais choix de nourriture de notre part, mais service impeccable"
Anywhere else it would be a 2 Michelin stars restaurant. Creative, local food, knowledgeable and friendly service. Flexible portions for odd size groups. Every dish a fabulous culinary experience. Good selection of wines and cocktails.
"(Translated by Google) Great disappointment for this restaurant that I was eager to try. To begin with, being a beer lover, I was recommended two of the most expensive beers on the menu, retailing at $72 and $69 a bottle, an amount which I believe is staggering for one beer, while I could have been offered another something more reasonable. I felt a bit scammed. As for the food, I enjoyed the scallop starter and the chocolate tart. As for the rest, one word aptly describes my experience “imbalance”. Precisely the balance of flavors was badly dosed. A fish that was far too sweet, the chicken which was supposedly marinated for three days was more than disappointing and bland. The plates did not have a presentation worthy of the price they were worth. It's easy to find much better elsewhere. Nice atmosphere and courteous staff, but a little pressure to take the most expensive products on the alcohol menu.

(Original)
Grande déception pour ce restaurant que j’avais hâte d’essayer. Pour commencer, étant amateur de bières, on m’a conseillé deux bières les plus dispendieuses du menu se détaillant à 72$ et 69$ la bouteille, somme qui est selon moi est faramineuse pour une bière tandis qu’on aurait pu me proposer autre chose de plus raisonnable. Je me suis senti un peu arnaqué. En ce qui concerne la nourriture, j’ai apprécié l’entrée de pétoncles et la tarte au chocolat. Pour

but a little pressure to take the most expensive products on the alcohol menu.

(Original)
Grande déception pour ce restaurant que j’avais hâte d’essayer. Pour commencer, étant amateur de bières, on m’a conseillé deux bières les plus dispendieuses du menu se détaillant à 72$ et 69$ la bouteille, somme qui est selon moi est faramineuse pour une bière tandis qu’on aurait pu me proposer autre chose de plus raisonnable. Je me suis senti un peu arnaqué. En ce qui concerne la nourriture, j’ai apprécié l’entrée de pétoncles et la tarte au chocolat. Pour ce qui est du reste, un mot décrit bien mon expérience «  déséquilibre « . Justement l’équilibre des saveurs étaient mal dosées.Un poisson beaucoup trop sucré, le poulet qui était supposément mariné pendant trois jours était plus que décevant et fade. Les assiettes n’avaient pas une présentation digne du prix qu’elles valaient. Il est facile de trouver beaucoup mieux ailleurs. Belle ambiance et personnel courtois par contre un peu de pression pour prendre les produits les plus dispendieux à la carte d’alcool."
"(Translated by Google) I went on March 7 with my boyfriend.
I recommend 100%, our server gave us good advice and he knew his wines very well (my boyfriend has his sommelier course).
Honestly, nothing to say, the service was impeccable, the dishes were delicious, the wine too, the music is good, the work team helps each other, the waiters/cooks joke with each other, it gives the taste of work there! The decor is very well chosen!
The striped bass dish and the honey buckwheat dessert, my favorites! Go ahead and don't hesitate!

(Original)
Je suis allée le 7 mars dernier avec mon copain.
Je recommande à 100%, notre serveur nous a bien conseillé et il connaissait super bien ses vins (mon copain a son cours en sommellerie).
Honnêtement, rien à dire, le service était impeccable, les plats étaient délicieux, le vin aussi, la musique est bonne, l'équipe de travail s'entraide, les serveurs/cuisiniers font des blagues entre-eux, ça donne le goût de travailler là! Le décor est super bien choisi!
Le plat de bar rayé et le dessert sarrasin miel, mes coups de coeur! Allez-y hésitez surtout pas!"
First time in Montreal and Mon Lapin came highly recommended and it did not disappoint. From the moment we were greeted by the host to the moment we left, the staff made us feel so welcome and like a guest in their own home. The true star of our experience was our server Kevin. Kevin made sure to take his time walking us through the menu and expertly paired our wine to the plates we tried. I can’t recommend this place enough.
"(Translated by Google) But what an amazing place!
The quality of food, wine and service team is exceptional.
Best restaurant in town! You feel welcomed at home, the people are warm and the dishes enrich this feeling.
100%. No mistake. A+.
I love my bunny

(Original)
Mais quel endroit incroyable!
La qualité des aliments, des vins et de l’équipe de service est exceptionnelle.
Meilleur restaurant en ville! On se sent accueilli comme à la maison, les gens y sont chaleureux et les plats enrichissent ce sentiment.
100%.

made sure to take his time walking us through the menu and expertly paired our wine to the plates we tried. I can’t recommend this place enough.
"(Translated by Google) But what an amazing place!
The quality of food, wine and service team is exceptional.
Best restaurant in town! You feel welcomed at home, the people are warm and the dishes enrich this feeling.
100%. No mistake. A+.
I love my bunny

(Original)
Mais quel endroit incroyable!
La qualité des aliments, des vins et de l’équipe de service est exceptionnelle.
Meilleur restaurant en ville! On se sent accueilli comme à la maison, les gens y sont chaleureux et les plats enrichissent ce sentiment.
100%. Aucune faute. A+.
J’aime Mon Lapin"
"(Translated by Google) Very nice restaurant with really friendly service. The dishes are good, well cooked, for the most part but nothing exceptional, but there is a problem for some. Example: $20 knives. It's literally two knives. A knife is roughly the equivalent of a mussel. It is as if we had been served 2 mussels. And it's not by drowning it with elderberry and asparagus that it's better to pass the pill. Never seen that in my life, don't mess around.
The chicken, absolutely delicious, perfectly mastered cooking. But I find hair there, says it at the end nicely without having said anything during the meal (just to enjoy what). No reaction.
The wine now, we let ourselves be carried away and had a glass served without being given the price beforehand (again great atmosphere, the waiters are cool, we let ourselves go) which was not bad but clearly without more. $17. Glass. Bottles start at 70, which is correct, but after dropping $40 for 2 glasses, we stop there. It was good, the cooks know what they are doing, but it lacks generosity and honestly nothing exceptional in terms of flavor … I never complain about the quantities, as a cook I know that good products are expensive and the talent of the cooks is paid for. But this is supposed to be a wine bistro guys, not Le Meurice. Conclusion: $200 for 5 courses (starters, the terms must be said), and two glasses of wine. It's more expensive than Damascus 😬 Overall quite disappointed.

(Original)
Tres jolie restaurant avec un service vraiment sympathique. Les plats sont bons, bien cuisinés, pour la plupart mais rien d’exceptionnel, mais y’a comme un problème pour certains. Exemple: Les couteaux à 20$. C’est littéralement deux couteaux. Un couteau c’est à peu prêt l’équivalent d’une moule. C’est comme si on nous avait servi 2 moules. Et c’est pas en noyant ca avec du sureau et des asperges que ça fait mieux passer la pilule. Jamais vu ça de ma vie faut quand même pas déconner.
Le poulet, absolument délicieux, cuisson parfaitement maîtrisée. Mais j’y trouve des cheveux, le dit à la fin gentiment sans avoir rien dit pendant le repas (histoire de profiter quoi). Aucune réaction.
Le vin maintenant, on s’est laissé entraîner et fait servir un verre sans qu’on nous en ait donné le prix avant (encore une fois super ambiance, les serveurs sont cools, on se laisse aller) qui était pas mal mais clairement sans plus. 17$. Le verre. Les bouteilles commencent à 70, ce qui est correc, mais après avoir lâcher 40$ pour 2 verres ba on s’arrête là. C’était bon, les cuisiniers savent ce qu’ils font,

trouve des cheveux, le dit à la fin gentiment sans avoir rien dit pendant le repas (histoire de profiter quoi). Aucune réaction.
Le vin maintenant, on s’est laissé entraîner et fait servir un verre sans qu’on nous en ait donné le prix avant (encore une fois super ambiance, les serveurs sont cools, on se laisse aller) qui était pas mal mais clairement sans plus. 17$. Le verre. Les bouteilles commencent à 70, ce qui est correc, mais après avoir lâcher 40$ pour 2 verres ba on s’arrête là. C’était bon, les cuisiniers savent ce qu’ils font, mais ca manque de générosité et honnêtement rien d’exceptionnel en terme de saveur … Je ne râle jamais sur les quantités, en tant que cuisiner je sais que les bons produits coûtent chers et le talent des cuisiniers se paye.  Mais c’est censé être un bistrot à vin les mecs, pas le Meurice. Conclusion : 200$ pour 5 plats (des entrées, faut dire les termes), et deux verres de vin. C’est plus cher que le Damas 😬 Globalement assez déçu."
"(Translated by Google) Disappointing..
Outrageous prices that could be justified by exceptional food, unfortunately this was not the case. Flavors that are certainly good but accessible, $20 TWO knives, bread that is bathed in oil, and to top it off, several hairs found in the chicken.
Extremely friendly waitresses who unfortunately tricked us into buying a glass of wine for which we hadn't had the price...$17, that put us off for the meal. No drink for less than $14 according to the waitress and given the quality of the one at $17, that doesn't bode well...

Finally, a very average experience because the restaurant is sublime, the atmosphere is good and the presentation of the dishes is beautiful, but nothing more that is worth this exorbitant price: $190 including tax for two people with 5 tiny plates and therefore two glasses of wine only.
I would not recommend.

(Original)
Décevant..
Des prix mirobolants qui pourraient être justifiés par une nourriture exceptionnelle, malheureusement ce n’était pas le cas. Des saveurs certes bonnes mais accessibles, 20$ DEUX couteaux, du pain qui baigne dans l’huile, et pour couronner le tout, plusieurs cheveux retrouvés dans le poulet.
Des serveuses extrêmement sympathiques qui nous ont malheureusement piégés dans l’achat d’un verre de vin dont nous n’avions pas eu le prix…17$, ça nous a refroidi pour le repas. Aucun verre à moins de 14$ selon la serveuse et vu la qualité de celui à 17, cela ne présage rien de bon…

Enfin, une expérience très moyenne car le restaurant est sublime, l’ambiance est bonne et la présentation des plats est belle, mais rien de plus qui vaille ce prix exorbitant: 190$ TTC pour deux personnes avec 5 assiettes minuscules et donc deux verres de vin seulement.
Je ne recommanderais pas."
Amazing experience! We ordered 5 dishes for two people, including the scallop sandwich, the mushroom pie, and tagliatelle, which were delicious. Those were among my favorites, but the other dishes and the desserts were great as well. The waitress was really attentive and gave us great recommendations on wine pairings for each set of dishes. Overall, it was a great restaurant that I would recommend. Just make sure to make a resevesation several

le restaurant est sublime, l’ambiance est bonne et la présentation des plats est belle, mais rien de plus qui vaille ce prix exorbitant: 190$ TTC pour deux personnes avec 5 assiettes minuscules et donc deux verres de vin seulement.
Je ne recommanderais pas."
Amazing experience! We ordered 5 dishes for two people, including the scallop sandwich, the mushroom pie, and tagliatelle, which were delicious. Those were among my favorites, but the other dishes and the desserts were great as well. The waitress was really attentive and gave us great recommendations on wine pairings for each set of dishes. Overall, it was a great restaurant that I would recommend. Just make sure to make a resevesation several weeks in advance.
"(Translated by Google) I have only one word: Bravo!

(Original)
Je n'ai qu'un mot: Bravo !"
"(Translated by Google) Too good! I highly recommend this restaurant. The atmosphere is very pleasant and the food is exquisite. Let yourself be guided by the suggestions of the waiters who will choose dishes to share that go perfectly with the wine

(Original)
Trop bon! Je recommande vivement ce restaurant. L’ambiance est très plaisante et la nourriture est exquise. Laissez vous guider par les suggestions des serveurs qui vous choisiront des plats à partager qui s’agence a merveille avec le vin"
Excellent service and the group meal was very well selected by the waiter. Can not wait to come back!
Incredible restaurant with delicious sharing dishes. Staff were also super knowledgeable. Great selection of wine. We got the scallop sandwich, pork, razor clams, and others, all of which were incredible. We usually don't like going to restaurants twice but definitely plan on returning here!
"(Translated by Google) Oh my God. Incredible experience. Honestly every bite is amazing. The wines I was recommended were just as amazing! You have to go there at least once in your life!
UPDATE: they are accepting reservations now. 3 visits later, I still think this is the best restaurant in Montreal

(Original)
Oh.Mon.Dieu. Expérience incroyable. Honnêtement chaque bouchée est extraordinaire. Les vins qu'on m'a conseillés étaient tout aussi incroyable! Il faut y aller au moins une fois dans sa vie!
UPDATE: ils acceptent les réservations maintenant. 3 visites plus tard, je pense encore qu'il s'agit du meilleur resto à Montréal"
"(Translated by Google) Really excellent, the wine, the service, the atmosphere, the food: everything

(Original)
Vraiment excellent, le vin, le service, l’ambiance, la nourriture: tout"
"A wonderful experience in a quaint restaurant. The food was simply delicious (I'm still dreaming about their scallops sandwich, it was like eating a cloud) and they helped me paired my many plates with fun and unexpected wines.
Service was impeccable and I cannot wait to go back."
"Rabbits!!
We ordered scallop sandwich, razor clam, beets with smoked eel, tagliatelle (favorite), mushroom tart, lamb (another favorite), buckwheat cake, and chocolate tart. All the dishes were great, as well as the mocktails the bartender girl with sparkling eyeshadow created for each course. Desserts were a bit too sweet for me."
"(Translated by Google) Probably my favorite place in Montreal. The food, alcohol, ambience and service are consistently at a solid 5 star. We can never eat enough of their buckwheat cake. Nice terrace.

(Original)
Probablement mon endroit préféré à Montréal. La nourriture, l'alcool, l'ambiance et le service sont constamment à

wait to go back."
"Rabbits!!
We ordered scallop sandwich, razor clam, beets with smoked eel, tagliatelle (favorite), mushroom tart, lamb (another favorite), buckwheat cake, and chocolate tart. All the dishes were great, as well as the mocktails the bartender girl with sparkling eyeshadow created for each course. Desserts were a bit too sweet for me."
"(Translated by Google) Probably my favorite place in Montreal. The food, alcohol, ambience and service are consistently at a solid 5 star. We can never eat enough of their buckwheat cake. Nice terrace.

(Original)
Probablement mon endroit préféré à Montréal. La nourriture, l'alcool, l'ambiance et le service sont constamment à un solide 5 étoiles. On ne mangera jamais assez de leur gâteau au sarazin. Belle terrasse."
Great service,  food is good. A bit pricey for the size of the meal.
The food was phenomenal! The sourdough chicken was so delicious. I just didn’t like the salad on the menu because it had a weird play-dough smell and taste. Other than that, everything was incredible. Highly recommend. One of the best restaurants in the city and country.
Lovely ambience, and excellent service. My friend and I were taken care of by Kevin - he curated a lovely dining experience was able to accommodate my friend’s dietary restrictions being vegan. I absolutely loved the scallop sandwich as well as the crudo, and the wine pairings were on point.
"(Translated by Google) General disappointment: perhaps because it was a Saturday evening, but deafening music which made it difficult for the waiter to discuss and explain the menu, insistence on the part of the staff to serve us in English (although they are obviously French-speaking or perfectly bilingual even though I spoke to them in French), deficient wine service which arrives at the end of the meal, uneven dishes (or perhaps the cacophony did not allow us to appreciate the subtlety). But radio silence as I delivered my comments by email, so I'm doing it here, maybe they'll get to them. Too bad, this place seemed like the ideal neighborhood restaurant. Or maybe we had too many expectations. Maybe we'll try it on the terrace so we can chat without shouting, or maybe not!

(Original)
Déception générale : peut-être parce que c'était un samedi soir, mais musique assourdissante qui rendait les échanges et la déclinaison du menu par le serveur difficiles, insistance de la part du personnel de nous servir en anglais (alors qu'ils sont visiblement francophones ou parfaitement bilingues alors que je m'adressais à eux en français), service de vin déficient qui arrive à la fin du repas, plats inégaux (ou peut-être la cacophonie ne nous permettait pas d'en apprécier la subtilité). Mais silence radio alors que j'ai livré mes commentaires par courriel, je le fais donc ici, peut-être se rendront-ils à eux. Dommage, cet endroit nous semblait le resto de quartier idéal. Ou peut-être avions-nous trop d'attentes. Peut-être l'essaierons-nous en terrasse pour pouvoir échanger sans crier, ou peut-être pas!"
Eating at this restaurant is simply a magical experience! I came here with my partner to celebrate a late birthday, and they accommodated a "walk in" reservation. The food was incredible, incredibly diverse and original. Service was also great, and the servers were passionate about their work and the food being served. Their buckwheat cake is to die for!!
"(Translated by Google) After a second visit we still do not

se rendront-ils à eux. Dommage, cet endroit nous semblait le resto de quartier idéal. Ou peut-être avions-nous trop d'attentes. Peut-être l'essaierons-nous en terrasse pour pouvoir échanger sans crier, ou peut-être pas!"
Eating at this restaurant is simply a magical experience! I came here with my partner to celebrate a late birthday, and they accommodated a "walk in" reservation. The food was incredible, incredibly diverse and original. Service was also great, and the servers were passionate about their work and the food being served. Their buckwheat cake is to die for!!
"(Translated by Google) After a second visit we still do not understand the buzz around this restaurant. Some good stuff but with all the restos around it would definitely not be my first choice.

(Original)
Après une deuxième visite on ne comprend toujours pas le buzz autour de ce resto.   Quelques trucs bons mais avec tout ce qu’il y a autour en termes de restos ce serait définitivement pas mon premier choix."
"(Translated by Google) Very attentive service: the waiters take care of their customers and inform them about the dishes and the alcohols.
The portions are not very generous, but this allows us to taste several dishes in the same meal.

(Original)
Service très attentionné: les serveurs prennent soin de leurs clients et les renseignent sur les plats et les alcools.
Les portions sont peu généreuses, mais cela nous permet de déguster plusieurs plats dans le même repas."
We loved everything about this meal. The ambience, the staff, the foods. We let them choose our dishes and I am so glad we did. About $250 with a lot of wine and beverages and so much food for two people you could burst of happiness. Fair pricing for such high quality. Go now!
"(Translated by Google) Legendary
Genuine narration by the serving staff on the dishes. A mastery in cooking level taste.
Amazing wine selection! Expert Sommelier
Flat on the choice of dishes, but the contrast is fun
Hurry to go back.

(Original)
Légendaire
Une véritable narration par le personnel de service sur les plats. Une maîtrise en cuisine niveau goût.
Sélection de vin incroyable ! Sommelier.e expert.e
Bémol sur le choix de la vaisselle, mais le contraste est amusant
Hâte d’y retourner."
Kevin is annoying
Original, fresh, local flavours. Warm and inviting staff and ambiance. Great wine! Overall the experience you get here is a real treat. My only complaint is that now my food at home doesn’t taste so good. I think about this buckwheat cake literally almost every day.
"(Translated by Google) I did not understand very well. Reading the reviews, this restaurant looked extraordinary, a great gastronomic experience that I was eager to try.
Unfortunately, it is clear that it was rather missed, tastes much too strong, bordering on invasive and a lack of balance in the flavors.
Better to leave the camelina to the horses and use the smoked eel sparingly.
On the other hand, really friendly staff!

(Original)
Je n'ai pas bien compris. À lire les commentaires ce resto avait l'air extraordinaire, une super expérience gastronomique que j'avais hâte d'essayer.
Malheureusement, force est de constater que c'était plutôt raté, des goûts beaucoup trop forts, limite envahissants et un manque d'équilibre dans les saveurs.
Mieux vaut laisser la cameline aux chevaux et utiliser

clear that it was rather missed, tastes much too strong, bordering on invasive and a lack of balance in the flavors.

(Original)
Je n'ai pas bien compris. À lire les commentaires ce resto avait l'air extraordinaire, une super expérience gastronomique que j'avais hâte d'essayer.
Malheureusement, force est de constater que c'était plutôt raté, des goûts beaucoup trop forts, limite envahissants et un manque d'équilibre dans les saveurs.

Par contre, staff vraiment sympathique !"
Creative dishes with fantastic wine pairings. The beets with smoked eel and radicchio with foie gras were our favorites
Tough to say anything bad about this place! The food was exquisite and delicious. The service was tip top from every single person we spoke to, but especially from our talented server and bartender. The space was vibrant and full of energy, even on a snowy Thursday night. Very very easy to see why this place has the report it has, and why it’s consistently ranked one of the best restos in Canada.
Dining experience to be shared with close friends - ENJOY
This place is the real deal. Must try.
"(Translated by Google) Good

(Original)
Bon"
By far the worst restaurant experience I’ve ever had in Montreal. I made a reservation for the evening, and upon arrival I couldn’t even get inside the place because there was a line at the door. And everybody in line had reservations as well. Clearly there is a poor management of tables and customers, and although I understand that issues may arise and no one is perfect, what really upset me was the fact that not even once there was anyone from their staff checking the door or giving any explanations or apologies to us. We literally had to wait for almost one hour in line, outside, on a rainy evening, until someone showed up. Again, no apologies for messing up with our (and everybody else’s) reservations, nor they even brought us to our table: instead, they said that the only availability they had was outside in the terrace. I said I wouldn’t want to be sitting at the terrace because firstly it was raining, and secondly, I had placed a reservation explicitly for an indoor table. Then they simply let us wait even more outside until a table inside was available, after a total of one hour and forty minutes delay from our original reservation time. Food was okay and honestly I couldn’t appreciate the experience anymore given how upset and disappointed I was. What was supposed to be a nice evening ended up ruined by the worst service I’ve ever received in this city. I couldn’t recommend Mon Lapin less.
"(Translated by Google) Pleasantly surprised by this place, especially in terms of food! I didn't know what to expect and wowwww the quality of the food for each of the dishes was amazing, it was delicious! It was a beautiful evening and I was able to discover a lot of flavor through this evening!

(Original)
Agreablement surprise de cette endroit, surtout en termes de nourriture! Je ne savais pas à quoi m'attendre et wowwww la qualité de la nourriture pour chacun des plats etait incroyable, c'etait delicieux! Cetait une belle soirée et jai pu decouvrir beaucoup de saveur a travers cette soirée!"
"The kind of place to visit without forethought, taking advantage of seatings saved for walk-in diners. A new menu is served daily in accordance with the whims of the day. Ask about any particular ingredient on the menu and you are sure to be met with a lengthy story on their

evening and I was able to discover a lot of flavor through this evening!

"The kind of place to visit without forethought, taking advantage of seatings saved for walk-in diners. A new menu is served daily in accordance with the whims of the day. Ask about any particular ingredient on the menu and you are sure to be met with a lengthy story on their source.

The pinnacle of restaurant de quartier."
"(Translated by Google) Food composed of hazardous mixtures, which are meant to be daring but which are just missed. Strong tastes but lacking finesse.
The wines on offer were acidic, pungent and overall undrinkable.
$240 for an evening to forget, the best moment was when I was finally able to brush my teeth to make the eel/fried mushroom mixture disappear.

Friendly and attentive service, pretty room.

(Original)
Bouffe composée de mélanges hasardeux, qui se veulent osés mais qui sont juste ratés. Des goûts forts mais manquants de finesse.
Les vins proposés étaient acides, piquants et globalement imbuvables.
240$ pour une soirée à oublier, le meilleur moment a été quand j’ai enfin pu me brosser les dents pour faire disparaître le mélange anguille/champignons frits.

Service amical et prévenant, jolie salle."
The food was delicious, as was the wine. I loved the accessible format of by-the-glass. Please note this is not a vegetarian-friendly kitchen: menu has very little options, no substitutions were made, plates came with meat on them (after asking for it to be removed), and no adjustments were made to the bill. I will not be returning to eat.
The best restaurant I've eaten at in 2022. The servers are very attentive and the food was spectacular. Though it was difficult to get a reservation, it was worth it!
I had the pleasure of dining at Vin Mon Lapin, and what a truly incredible experience it was! The food was simply amazing – I particularly enjoyed the pasta plate, which was one of the best I've ever had. The cozy atmosphere was very inviting, and the wine selection was excellent. The decor was also very nice and added to the overall pleasant atmosphere. All in all, I would highly recommend this restaurant to any diner looking for an amazing culinary experience in an inviting setting. 10/10
The best spot in Montreal to share amazing plates and drink the best wine
It was a spectacular evening! Rose was amazing, taking us on a journey of spectacular food and wines! Thank you for being so generous and welcoming.
Amazing food and delicious wines. Nothing you’ve experienced before.

(Original)
bouffe correct mais clairement beaucoup trop chère pour la quantité, service expéditif, choix de vin au verre limité, vin rouge servi très froid. 25$ le digestif… Nous avions hâte de découvrir ce lieux très prisé (très difficile d’avoir une réservation) nous ne reviendrons plus. 305$ pour 2 personnes…"
This place made us wait 45 minutes for our table. The hostess was rude the whole time tonight and was sitting and drinking with her friends at a table nearby. Food was subpar and overpriced. Overall would not recommend.
Beautiful room,  cozy and bustling,  with excellent service. My expectations were exceeded when they were able to create a multi course vegetarian meal for me (my dining partner is not and loved her dishes as well). The buckwheat cake is not too be missed!
Delicious food and amazing service. We got the taster's menu, and everything was incredibly delicious. We also tried their dessert options and a delicious bottle of wine. I recommend for a group hang!
"Love love this restaurant, the concept is great and the food is always amazing! Everything is super good, specially the fish dishes, and the cheese to finish dinner
Wines are also really good 💛"

We shared 5 plates and a dessert along with well chosen wine by the glass to

meal for me (my dining partner is not and loved her dishes as well). The buckwheat cake is not too be missed!
Delicious food and amazing service. We got the taster's menu, and everything was incredibly delicious. We also tried their dessert options and a delicious bottle of wine. I recommend for a group hang!
"Love love this restaurant, the concept is great and the food is always amazing! Everything is super good, specially the fish dishes, and the cheese to finish dinner
Wines are also really good 💛"
"We enjoyed a dinner here last night. Despite the aggressive and questionable welcome by the Sommelier, our service was impeccable. An incredible team makes up for it.

We shared 5 plates and a dessert along with well chosen wine by the glass to match.

Rose, our server was above and beyond. Knowledgable, fun and kind. One of our favourite meals together. We will be back and recommending to many!

Thank you.    Je t'apprécie"
At one point during the meal, I almost teared up for how good the food was. Without a doubt the best dinning experience I've ever had. The service went above and beyond the call of duty and quite frankly helped make such a pleasant experience. Will definitely be back again and will be spreading the word of how amazing this place is. If I could give it 10 stars out of 5 I would, it was that good. Y'all the real MVP'S keep it up.
"(Translated by Google) Fabulous dining experience that ventures far off the beaten track. The meal got better as we progressed through the dishes. Indeed, for my table partner, the delightful Flemish Beauty tart with green tea with rice was the perfect crowning of the evening.

In addition, we strongly suggest that you try, if available, the Matsukake (and take care to dip your bread in the broth!) and the trout. And go for it with wines by the glass that go perfectly with the characteristics of the preparations.

Perhaps the best part of it all was the bill which, considering the quality and our level of delight, seemed way low!

We therefore say that Mon Lapin fully deserves its status as one of the best tables in the country and we will definitely come back to it!

Almost impeccable service, except that we forgot to bring our bread. Well, nothing to quibble about, it's easily forgiven.

Cheerful atmosphere and therefore a bit noisy, but we hear each other talk.

Thank you and good continuation!

(Original)
Fabuleuse expérience gastronomique qui s'aventure bien loin des sentiers battus. Le repas s'est amélioré au fur et à mesure que nous progressions au travers des plats. En effet, pour ma partenaire de table, la ravissante tarte Beauté Flamande avec le thé vert au riz fut le couronnement parfait de la soirée.

Au surplus, nous vous suggérons vivement d'essayer, si disponibles, le Matsukake (et prenez le soin de saucer votre pain dans le bouillon!) et la truite. Et allez-y avec les vins au verre qui se marient parfaitement avec les caractéristiques des préparations.

Peut-être que le meilleur dans tout ça, c'est la facture qui, compte tenu de la qualité et de notre niveau de ravissement, semblait bien basse!

Nous disons donc que Mon Lapin mérite amplement son statut d'une des meilleures tables au pays et nous y reviendrons sans hésiter!

Service quasi impeccable, sauf qu'on a oublié d'apporter notre pain. Bon, pas de quoi épiloguer, ça se pardonne facilement.

Ambiance joyeuse et par conséquent un peu bruyante,

au verre qui se marient parfaitement avec les caractéristiques des préparations.

Nous disons donc que Mon Lapin mérite amplement son statut d'une des meilleures tables au pays et nous y reviendrons sans hésiter!

Ambiance joyeuse et par conséquent un peu bruyante, mais on s'entend parler.

Merci et bonne continuation!"
Most excellent. Service was on point. Even so, the food exceeded our expectations, even for seasoned foodies.  Visited for our 25th wedding anniversary and they made it quite memorable. Of all the highly recommended places in Montreal,  vin mon lapin beats them hands down.
"(Translated by Google) Immediately upon entering, we are greeted by an extraordinary hostess named Vania! Smiling, friendly! The ambience of the restaurant is wonderful. The impeccable service of the server Kevin was remarkable! With the dishes to share as delicious as each other! Veal rice, knife, scallops and more... Bravo! Karina

(Original)
Tout de suite en entrant, nous sommes accueilli par une extraordinaire hôtesse du nom de Vania! Souriante, sympathique ! L'ambiance du restaurant est magnifique. Le service impeccable du serveur Kevin fût remarquable ! Avec les plats à partager aussi succulent les uns des autres! Riz de veau, couteau,  pétoncles et plus... Bravo ! Karina"
"(Translated by Google) Great service. Interesting, diverse and delicious menu. Good selection of wine.

(Original)
Excellent service. Menu intéréssant, diversifé et délicieux. Bonne selection de vin."
Almost every dish was an absolute hit! Can't wait to go back
Possibly my favorite meal ever. Each item we had was incredible. The scallop sandwiches were out of this world. I could eat the razor clams every day. And, the chicken...outstanding. Service was impeccable without being pretentious.
Food was ok but overpriced in my opinion for what you get. Nice ambiance and great service. If you are looking for something different its worth a look.
Just amazing. In the past I haven't been a fan of small plates for sharing because they seem not to deliver but this place just nails the idea. Stunning experience.
Amazing! Fantastic experience with our server, Rose. The people who work here have a passion for what they're doing and it really comes through. The food was excellent and the wine pairing was perfect. A true Montreal gem. Expect to eat more and drink more than you anticipated... You won't want to stop the French inspired tapas.
The service, food, and wine were absolutely spectacular.  Every dish was a delight, never shared so many verbal 'WOW's during a meal...  Huge kudos to the team there!
The food was delicious and very fresh! So many different flavours. The day we went, the menu had mainly seafood on it. It was a little bit like having tapas where everyone was sharing each plate so we could try everything. However, this place is pricey. We had 6 plates to share, 2 glasses of wine each, a dessert and a digestive adding up to $300 with tip and taxes. The ambiance was perfect for a date night and the staff was super friendly and helpful. They knew their menu. We will definitely come back on special occasions.
Amazing!
Unreal. This might have been the best dinner experience I’ve had. Waiter Renaud was knowledgeable about the wine and food, and so personable he was our best friend and I miss him

many verbal 'WOW's during a meal...  Huge kudos to the team there!
The food was delicious and very fresh! So many different flavours. The day we went, the menu had mainly seafood on it. It was a little bit like having tapas where everyone was sharing each plate so we could try everything. However, this place is pricey. We had 6 plates to share, 2 glasses of wine each, a dessert and a digestive adding up to $300 with tip and taxes. The ambiance was perfect for a date night and the staff was super friendly and helpful. They knew their menu. We will definitely come back on special occasions.
Amazing!
Unreal. This might have been the best dinner experience I’ve had. Waiter Renaud was knowledgeable about the wine and food, and so personable he was our best friend and I miss him already. Other staff somehow even made us feel welcome. Atmosphere was perfect. Memorable evening with great friends, worth every penny.
The most creative, exceptional food and a fun atmosphere. The wait staff is exceptional, knowledgeable and expressive about the menu, the same when they're putting the plate on the table! Would definitely go back!
"Unbelievable! Our server Tanya seriously knew what she was doing…she was knowledgeable, fun, and created an unforgettable dining experience.

The dishes were innovative and super tasty, portions were perfect. This spot is an absolute must if you’re somebody who loves food and visiting Montréal! We can’t wait to come back…thank you Tanya you’re a legend!!!!

PS: if you’re willing, let the chefs decide on your dishes, they’re masters at their craft and it will not disappoint. Everything was a surprise and each dish was unreal."
It was a great experience. I could not get a table from online reservation so I called and I am surprised I got a table. From the start to the end of the supper, everything was great. The staffs are very nice and motivated. The food are top notch. Every meal gives us a challenge to select the best one. I will definitely come back.
"(Translated by Google) We were 2 couples. Since it was our first time, the waitress recommended that we go with a tasting menu. She chose 8 dishes that she thought were the most popular. In general, we liked the recommendations except for the eggplant & cantaloupe dish. The buckwheat cake was delicious! The service was excellent. They had a good wine selection and the natural wine and beer recommendations were excellent. We had a very nice evening.

(Original)
Nous étions 2 couples. Puisque c'était notre première fois, la serveuse nous a recommandé d'y aller avec un menu dégustation. Elle a choisi 8 plats qui selon elle étaient les plus populaires. En général, nous avons aimé les recommandations à l'exception du plat d'aubergine & cantaloup. Le gâteau au sarrasin était délicieux! Le service était excellent. Ils avaient une bonne sélection de vins et les recommandations de vins naturels et de bières étaient excellentes. Nous avons passé une très belle soirée."
Easily one of the best restaurants I have been in a long time. Bistrology at its best.
Everything is content.
Had one the most memorable dinner of our Montreal trip at this charming restaurant. Food and wine pairings were outstanding.
